      • 4.3.1. Primary settings
        • 4.3.1.1. Then click Create.
        • 4.3.1.2. A new blank record is created (Figure 7). To be able to save the record you have to fill the minimum required elements as it is described in chapter 3.3.3.
      • 4.3.2. General features of the editing environment
        • 4.3.2.1. Warning: If you start editing data in EGDI-full form and then switch to EGDI-Lite and save the record, you may lose the content of fields that are available in the EGDI-full form as an extension (see more in chapter 0).
